title: The Busy Honeybee
description: Honeybees are flying insects known for their ability to produce honey and wax. They live in highly organized colonies and play a vital role in pollination.

questions.question: What is the primary role of a worker bee?
How do honeybees communicate the location of food to other bees?
options: By buzzing in a specific pattern

questions.question: What is the purpose of the honeybee's stinger?
options: To defend the hive, which results in the bee's death
To kill predators and then live on
questions.correct_answer: To defend the hive, which results in the bee's death

questions.question: What is the function of the queen bee in a colony?
options: She is the primary honey producer
She is the only one who collects pollen
She lays all the eggs in the colony
questions.correct_answer: She lays all the eggs in the colony
